pages.title: Kamen Rider Dark Ghost
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ghost (2015, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ghost/devices/dark_ghost_driver)Ghost Driver (Dark Ghost)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Ghost Driver or Mega Ulorder user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Strength V

pages.title: Kamen Rider Dark Ghost
